name: CP3D
summary: CP3D is a free virtual world inspired by Disney's Club Penguin. We offer everything Club Penguin had, but with a 3D twist using the Unity game engine! If you're looking for fun, friends, and minigames then look no further than CP3D!

name: CPU Architecture Sim
summary: The logic puzzle that requires attention and a creative approach to meet the challenges.

name: CPD
summary: 32 Maps made in DOOM2 format and intended for limit removing ports. Most maps are small to medium in size and average around 170 monsters. Intended for UV play but other difficulties available.

name: Cpt. Balloney: Painful days at home
summary: Play as a former captain (of a space ship) on the run in the frist part "painful days at home" when your ship crashed and you had to hide inside the home of some unknown guy. Enjoy a gameplay with no hassle, as time doesn't matter here, promise.

name: CPCMiniPac
summary:
Developed as part of the 2023 BASIC 10-Liner contest. CPCMiniPac is a game based on Pac-Man. The aim is to eat all the points without getting caught by a ghost. The game is controlled with the arrow keys.

There are 2 big dots that cannot be eaten.

However, the ghosts can pass these points. So be careful!

name: CPRC: Extant Hunters
summary: Hunt dinosaurs. With friends. CPRC: Extant Hunters is a single player/cooperative multiplayer game that pits players against the most intelligent, formidable, and brutal predators in history.

name: CPA: Reports Bousy
summary: Experience the constant fear and loneliness surrounded by the decrepit old walls of an abandoned house with a tragic story, while feeling the true horror of being hunted by a creature created from a strong friendship. Try to survive and scape the house!
